item.title: Coinbase CEO posted a picture 13 hours ago showing a purchase of approximately 4.964 million BALAJI, currently worth about $40,000.
item.description: On August 24th, Coinbase's CEO, Brian Armstrong, posted a photo on the X platform 13 hours ago. In the photo, it shows his purchase of 4,964,005 BALAJIS, which is currently worth approximately $40,000.BALAJIS was created through the Zora platform. It is a meme concept coin named after Balaji Srinivasan, who was formerly Coinbase's CTO and an angel investor.It is reported that the current market value of BALAJIS is $8.21 million, and the 24-hour trading volume is $166,500.

item.title: A whale sold 123,500 LINK at an average price of $25.36 and still holds 425,000 LINK.
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale sold 123,500 LINK at a price of $25.36 and received 3.13 million USDC. It then transferred these funds to Compound and Aave for yield via Trust Wallet. The whale still retains 425,000 LINK, which is worth $10.8 million.

item.title: A certain whale has deposited 15.47 million USDC into HyperLiquid in the past 48 hours, and has gone long on BTC and BNB.
item.description: On August 24th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, during the past 48 hours, a particular whale deposited 15.47 million USDC into #HyperLiquid and initiated a long position:· For BTC with 20x leverage.· For BNB with 10x leverage.Furthermore, the whale also placed buy orders for ETH, SOL, LINK, and FARTCOIN.

item.title: A whale deposited 1.56 million USDC into HyperLiquid to leverage 1x long WLFI.
item.description: On August 24th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 1.56 million USDC into HyperLiquid after being dormant for 8 months. Subsequently, it opened a WLFI long position with a leverage of 1x.

item.title: Wang Feng: Bitcoin Has Shed the Impact of Halving Cycles and Entered the Stock Market and Overall Economic Cycle
item.description: On August 24th, Wang Feng, the founder of Linekong Interactive, tweeted that, "In my personal opinion, Bitcoin has shaken off the influence of the halving cycle and entered the realm of the US stock market and the overall economic cycle. At present, it seems that Ethereum and the crypto wave behind it may also be increasingly likely to follow a similar trend. However, further observation is still required."

item.title: Jup Studio's meme coin Uranus briefly surpassed a $60 million market cap, with a 32% increase in the past 24 hours.
item.description: On August 24th, according to GMGN market information, the ecosystem meme coin Uranus of Jup Studio briefly reached a market capitalization of more than $60 million. It saw a more than 32% increase in the past 24 hours and a 24-hour trading volume exceeding $7.4 million.BlockBeats reminds users that the prices of meme coins are highly volatile, and users should invest with caution.

item.title: Analyst: Cyclical Indicator Shows Bitcoin is in the Late Bull Market Stage
item.description: On August 24th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. posted, indicating that "This week, Bitcoin fluctuated within a narrow range between $111,000 and $117,000, with a 90-day return of +5%, suggesting that the market is in a consolidation phase."Spot ETF Fund Flow (7 days): There was a net outflow of 2,400 BTC; the 7-day average trading volume is 545,000 BTC per day, alleviating the distribution pressure.In terms of the macro environment, the Federal Reserve hinted at the possibility of a rate cut. The declining yields provided support to the market, but it was still restricted by tariff and cost risks. The Index Market Phase cyclical indicator shows that Bitcoin is in the late bull market phase."

item.title: BIO Surges Above $0.3, Up Over 36% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 24th, based on HTX market data, BIO has surpassed $0.3 and is currently priced at $0.3099, with an increase of more than 36% in the past 24 hours.

item.title: Bio Protocol Founder: Over the past few weeks, the protocol has received over $4 million in liquidity fees and is currently integrating with a DeFi protocol to launch the BIO lending market.
item.description: On August 24th, Paul Kohlhaas, the founder of Bio Protocol, tweeted, "Bio Protocol has achieved revenues exceeding $4 million in the past few weeks through liquidity fees. While the majority view BIO as a 'DeSci launchpad,' the team is also tasked with managing all BioDAO liquidity pools and optimizing the protocol's proprietary liquidity (POL) and assets under management (AUM). Presently, Bio Protocol is engaged in collaborating on integrations with top DeFi protocols, with the launch of a lending market for BIO."

item.title: Bitcoin Dominance Falls to 58.23%, Reaches New Low Since January
item.description: On August 24th, based on market data, the Bitcoin dominance (BTC.D) has seen a 2.35% decrease over the past week and currently stands at 58.23%, reaching a new low since January of this year.During the same period, the total crypto market capitalization has increased by 0.24% in the past week. The total market capitalization excluding Bitcoin (TOTAL 2) has risen by 3.69%, and the total market capitalization excluding Bitcoin and Ethereum (TOTAL 3) has increased by 1.48%.
